backend/main.mo: Defines data types and in-memory maps for products, orders, inquiries, carousels, category carousels, user profiles, and site content in a Motoko actor.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping a category-filtering feature to affected frontend files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten summaries for major frontend files including pages, hooks, and admin components.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration defining light and dark theme variables and applying global styles.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router routes, theme provider, and profile setup modal logic with code-splitting for main pages.
frontend/src/components/admin/CarouselMa: Manages five carousel slide slots with image optimization, upload, URL editing, enabling/disabling, and reordering.
frontend/src/components/admin/CategoryCa: Handles category‑specific carousel images with optimization, replacement, removal, and bulk save for five slots.
frontend/src/components/admin/InquiryMan: Displays customer inquiries and allows sending responses with status updates.
frontend/src/components/admin/OrderManag: Lists orders, updates status, formats details, and supports printing order information.
frontend/src/components/admin/ProductFor: Modal for creating or editing products with fields and optimized video/image upload management.
frontend/src/components/admin/ProductMan: Admin UI to list, add, edit, and delete products with image preview and modal form support.
frontend/src/components/admin/SiteConten: Form-based admin editor for site-wide content fields such as contact info, policies, and static text.
frontend/src/components/CategoryCarousel: Category carousel component fetching category slides, filtering enabled ones, and providing auto-rotation and navigation.
frontend/src/components/CategoryImageCar: Carousel for category-specific images with validation, auto-rotation, and conditional rendering based on fetched images.
frontend/src/components/CustomerPageStyl: Wraps children in a customer‑page scoped container for styling purposes.
frontend/src/components/footer/FooterSys: Footer component rendering logo, contact info, policy links, and optional footer text using a split layout.
frontend/src/components/HomeCarousel.tsx: Carousel that fetches slides, auto-rotates, supports manual navigation, and handles hover-pausing and slide transitions.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: Main app layout with header, navigation, authentication handling, category menu, and footer integration.
frontend/src/components/OrderDetailModal: Modal showing order details with status display and cancellation flow including reason submission.
frontend/src/components/ProductMediaCaro: Product media carousel supporting images and video with slide navigation and smooth transitions.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Modal for creating a user profile, saving it via actor, and updating related queries.
frontend/src/components/RouteLoadingFall: Skeleton-based loading placeholder for lazy-loaded routes.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches an authenticated or anonymous backend actor and refreshes dependent queries on identity change.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminUiBodyAttribu: Toggles a data-admin-ui attribute on the body during admin routes for scoped styling.
frontend/src/hooks/useCart.ts: Zustand store managing cart items, quantity updates, totals, and persisted state.
frontend/src/hooks/useCategoryCarouselQu: React Query hooks to fetch and update category-specific carousel images through the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useFooterVariant.ts: Simple hook returning a constant 'split' footer variant.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context and hooks for handling Internet Identity login, stored identity restoration, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for user profile, admin checks, carousel slides, and category-based slide CRUD, using an actor backend.
frontend/src/index.css: Provides Tailwind base imports and extensive CSS variables for light and dark theme color palettes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes the React app root with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/AdminDashboardPage.ts: Renders the admin dashboard with access control, stats, and management sections for products, orders, inquiries, and site content.
frontend/src/pages/CartPage.tsx: Displays and manages the user's shopping cart with quantity updates, removal, and pricing, requiring authentication.
frontend/src/pages/categories/AnkletsPag: Empty placeholder page with no implementation.
frontend/src/pages/categories/BridalJewe: Empty placeholder page with no implementation.
frontend/src/pages/categories/CategoryNo: Empty placeholder page with no implementation.
frontend/src/pages/categories/CategoryPa: Reusable category page component that filters products by category slug and displays them with carousels and cart actions.
frontend/src/pages/categories/EarringsPa: Empty category page placeholder for earrings.
frontend/src/pages/categories/LabGrownDi: Renders CategoryPageTemplate for the lab-grown diamonds jewellery category.
frontend/src/pages/categories/NecklacePa: Empty category page placeholder for necklaces.
Empty category page placeholder for rings.
frontend/src/pages/CheckoutPage.tsx: Handles the checkout flow including address entry, payment step, and order creation for each cart item.
frontend/src/pages/ContactPage.tsx: Page with authenticated contact form allowing users to submit inquiries using Internet Identity and backend mutation.
frontend/src/pages/CustomerDashboardPage: Displays authenticated user's orders and inquiries with status, stats, and order detail modal.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Homepage showing carousels and product grid with add‑to‑cart and buy‑now logic gated by authentication.
frontend/src/pages/OrdersPage.tsx: Empty placeholder page with no implementation.
frontend/src/pages/PaymentFailurePage.ts: Empty placeholder page with no implementation.
frontend/src/pages/PaymentSuccessPage.ts: Empty placeholder page with no implementation.
frontend/src/pages/ProductCategoryPage.t: Shows products filtered by category with category header, image carousels, and cart/buy actions.
frontend/src/pages/ProductDetailPage.tsx: Displays detailed product view with media carousel, pricing, quantity selection, and cart/checkout actions.
frontend/src/utils/mediaOptimization.ts: Provides image resizing/compression utilities and basic video preview generation for client-side media optimization.
frontend/src/utils/productCategories.ts: Defines product categories and helper functions for retrieving category metadata and options.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters using query strings and session storage.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration defining theme extensions, colors, and plugin usage.
project_state.json: Project state metadata including existing features, new requests, and architectural notes.
